key.name: window-height
key.description: Height of the window to be displayed.

key.name: window-width
key.description: Width of the window to be displayed.

key.name: active-element
key.description: Active element set in volume control

key.name: shown-elements
key.description: Set the elements to show in volume control

key.name: hidden-elements
key.description: Set the elements in whitelist to hide in volume control
